thread.title: Here's An Exclusive Clip Of *That* Britney Spears Lifetime Movie
thread.title_full: Here's An Exclusive Clip Of *That* Britney Spears Lifetime Movie

author: Christian Zamora
title: Here's An Exclusive Clip Of *That* Britney Spears Lifetime Movie
text:
View this image ›
Lifetime ID: 10428292 2. …And we have an exclusive clip of the cable drama, starring Natasha Basset as Spears, which highlights everything from the Pop Princess’ rise to fame and the ~events~ that subsequently followed: Video available at: https://video-cdn.buzzfeed.com/22502/mp4_1920X1080/1485809682 . Lifetime ID: 10428343 3. Based on the 20-second clip, it appears the movie will attempt to recreate Britney’s hypnotizing 2000 VMAs performance of “…Oops! I Did It Again”… Lifetime
Getty Images
 ID: 10428698 4. Lifetime
MTV
 ID: 10428795 5. Along with Britney’s ill-fated relationship with Justin Timberlake… Lifetime
Lifetime
 ID: 10428914 6. …And Britney’s marriage to Kevin Federline. Lifetime
Lifetime
 ID: 10429135 7. Oh! And one other thing: K-Fed is ripped as fuck in this retelling of Britney’s life. Lifetime
 ID: 10429088 8. Britney: Ever After premieres February 18 on Lifetime. View this image ›
